mainboard.name: Fatal Push

mainboard.name: Nethergoyf
mainboard.oracle_text:
Nethergoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

mainboard.name: Birthing Ritual
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature, look at the top seven cards of your library. Then you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, you may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among those cards onto the battlefield, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
